Smart Umbrella: Develop an umbrella with built-in sensors and a mobile app that can detect rain and wind conditions, automatically opening and closing the umbrella for you. The app can also track your location and provide real-time weather updates.

Glow-in-the-Dark Umbrella: Create an umbrella with a glow-in-the-dark coating, providing visibility and safety during nighttime walks or in low-light conditions. The umbrella can also have a detachable LED light source for added visibility.

Umbrella with Built-in Speaker: Design an umbrella with a built-in speaker that can play music or take hands-free calls. The speaker can be powered by a rechargeable battery and can be controlled through a remote or through voice commands.

Foldable and Adjustable Umbrella: Create an umbrella that can be folded and adjusted to different sizes, making it easy to carry and use in various weather conditions. The umbrella can also have a unique collapsing design that allows for easy storage.

Umbrella with Air Purification: Develop an umbrella with built-in air purification technology, such as a HEPA filter, that can remove pollutants and allergens from the air. This can provide an added layer of protection for people with respiratory issues or allergies during rainy days.
